[`BasesConfigFile`](BasesConfigFile)

## BasesConfigFile interface

Represents the serialized format of a Bases query as stored in a `.base` file.

 1.10.0

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface BasesConfigFile 
```

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |

|  [`summaries?`](BasesConfigFile/summaries) |  | <code>Record</code><code>&lt;string, string&gt;</code> | <p>_(Optional)_ Configuration for summary formulas used in this Base.</p><p>Key: Summary formula name. Value: Formula string.</p><p> 1.10.0</p> |
